verses.verse: Therefore thou shalt <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4931>charge,<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H3605>always.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H3045>know<s%> ye this <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I speak <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known,<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4148>chastisement<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and his stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%>

And his <S%H226>miracles,<s%> and his <S%H4639>acts,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and unto <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H776>land;<s%>

And <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> unto their <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and to their <S%H7393>chariots;<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> he <S%H853>made<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H6687>overflow<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them as they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, and how the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6>destroyed<s%> them <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%>
And <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto you in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> ye <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%>

And <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben:<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6475>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and swallowed them <S%H1104>up,<s%> and their <S%H1004>households,<s%> and their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3351>substance<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was in their <S%H7272>possession,<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
But <S%H3588><s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4639>acts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did.<s%>

Therefore shall ye <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it;

And <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them and to their <S%H2233>seed,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> goest <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, is <S%H3808>not<s%> as the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from <S%H834>whence<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye came <S%H3318>out,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> thou <S%H2232>sowedst<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and <S%H8248>wateredst<s%> it with thy <S%H7272>foot,<s%> as a <S%H1588>garden<s%> of herbs: <S%H3419><s%>

But the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, is a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2022>hills<s%> and <S%H1237>valleys,<s%> and <S%H8354>drinketh<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of heaven: <S%H8064><s%>

A <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1875>careth<s%> for the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H8548>always<s%> upon it, from the <S%H4480>beginning<s%> <S%H7225><s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H319>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> ye shall hearken <S%H8085>diligently<s%> <S%H8085><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul,<s%>

That I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> in his due <S%H6256>season,<s%> the first <S%H3138>rain<s%> and the latter <S%H4456>rain,<s%> that thou mayest gather <S%H622>in<s%> thy <S%H1715>corn,<s%> and thy <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and thine <S%H3323>oil.<s%>
And I will <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> in thy <S%H7704>fields<s%> for thy <S%H929>cattle,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>full.<s%>

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourselves, <S%H6435>that<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> be not <S%H6601>deceived,<s%> and ye turn <S%H5493>aside,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them;

And then the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you, and he shut <S%H6113>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> that there <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and that the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H2981>fruit;<s%> and lest ye <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you.

Therefore shall ye lay <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and <S%H5921>in<s%> your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H7194>bind<s%> them for a <S%H226>sign<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that they may <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> your <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> of them when thou <S%H3427>sittest<s%> in thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> and when thou <S%H1980>walkest<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> when thou liest <S%H7901>down,<s%> and when thou risest <S%H6965>up.<s%>
And thou shalt <S%H3789>write<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> the door <S%H4201>posts<s%> of thine <S%H1004>house,<s%> and upon thy gates: <S%H8179><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them, as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> ye shall diligently <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you, to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, to <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto him;

Then will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and ye shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> yourselves.

Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%> shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> yours: <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H314>uttermost<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall your <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H1961>be.<s%>

There shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of you and the <S%H4172>dread<s%> of you <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> upon, <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H1696>said<s%> unto you.
Behold, <S%H7200><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse;<s%>

<S%H853><s%> A <S%H1293>blessing,<s%> <S%H834>if<s%> ye <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you this day: <S%H3117><s%>

And a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> ye will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> but turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath brought thee <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, that thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim,<s%> and the <S%H7045>curse<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal.<s%>

Are <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H310>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> where the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goeth <S%H3996>down,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6160>champaign<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H436>plains<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh?<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you, and ye shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

And ye shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
